original_title: Rivera 2100 - Entre el ser & la nada
overview: In Rivera 2100, a corner house facing a railway’s warehouse in the suburbs of Buenos Aires, a young newlywed couple built, with its own hands, a house that was the beginning of their own cultural zeitgeist; a safe haven that irradiated music, art and freedom, in the midst of a country that was living its darkest and most violent time.
title: Rivera 2100 - Entre el ser & la nada
